ViewObject.Name: DadosRegresItemView
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT B.ITEM_IDITEM AS ID_ITEM, C.NM_ITEM AS NM_ITEM, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.DT_REALIZADA) AS MES_NUM, CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (DT_REALIZADA)) = 1 THEN 'Jan' WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (DT_REALIZADA)) = 2 THEN 'Fev' WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (DT_REALIZADA)) = 3 THEN 'Mar' WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (DT_REALIZADA)) = 4 THEN 'Abr' WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (DT_REALIZADA)) = 5 THEN 'Mai' WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (DT_REALIZADA)) = 6 THEN 'Jun' WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (DT_REALIZADA)) = 7 THEN 'Jul' WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (DT_REALIZADA)) = 8 THEN 'Ago' WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (DT_REALIZADA)) = 9 THEN 'Set' WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (DT_REALIZADA)) = 10 THEN 'Out' WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (DT_REALIZADA)) = 11 THEN 'Nov' WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM (DT_REALIZADA)) = 12 THEN 'Dez' END MES_DESC, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM B.DT_REALIZADA) AS ANO, SUM(B.QUANTFATURAMENTO) AS TOTAL_FAT_MES,SUM(B.QUANTCLIENTE) AS TOTAL_CLI_MES, TRUNC(REGR_AVGY(SUM(B.QUANTFATURAMENTO),EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.DT_REALIZADA)) OVER (ORDER BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM B.DT_REALIZADA),EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.DT_REALIZADA),B.ITEM_IDITEM),2) AS REGRESSAO_VALOR_FAT_MES, TRUNC(REGR_AVGY(SUM(B.QUANTCLIENTE),EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.DT_REALIZADA)) OVER (ORDER BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM B.DT_REALIZADA),EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.DT_REALIZADA),B.ITEM_IDITEM),2) AS REGRESSAO_VALOR_CLI_MES FROM CARGA_DADOS B INNER JOIN ITEM C ON B.ITEM_IDITEM = C.ID_ITEM WHERE B.DT_REALIZADA >= (SELECT TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(MAX(DT_REALIZADA),-5),'MONTH') AS DIA FROM CARGA_DADOS) GROUP BY B.ITEM_IDITEM,C.NM_ITEM,EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.DT_REALIZADA),EXTRACT(YEAR FROM B.DT_REALIZADA) ORDER BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM B.DT_REALIZADA),EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.DT_REALIZADA)
